verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God נִצָּ֥ב <WH5324> standeth בַּעֲדַת־ <WH5712> in the congregation אֵ֑ל <WH410> of the mighty בְּקֶ֖רֶב <WH7130> among אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> the gods יִשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <WH8199> he judgeth

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֥י <WH4970> How תִּשְׁפְּטוּ־ <WH8199> How long will ye judge עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> unjustly וּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> the persons רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> wicked תִּשְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
שִׁפְטוּ־ <WH8199> Defend דַ֥ל <WH1800> the poor וְיָת֑וֹם <WH3490> and fatherless עָנִ֖י <WH6041> to the afflicted וָרָ֣שׁ <WH7326> and needy הַצְדִּֽיקוּ׃ <WH6663> do justice
פַּלְּטוּ־ <WH6403> Deliver דַ֥ל <WH1800> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> and needy מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> [them] out of the hand רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked הַצִּֽילוּ׃ <WH5337> rid

לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יָֽדְע֨וּ ׀ <WH3045> They know וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יָבִ֗ינוּ <WH995> not neither will they understand בַּחֲשֵׁכָ֥ה <WH2825> on in darkness יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <WH1980> they walk יִ֝מּ֗וֹטוּ <WH4131> are out of course כָּל־ <WH3605> All מ֥וֹסְדֵי <WH4144> all the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <WH589> I אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> I have said אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> Ye [are] gods אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> of you וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> and all of you [are] children עֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> of the most High כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <WH3605> and all
אָ֭כֵן <WH403> But כְּאָדָ֣ם <WH120> like men תְּמוּת֑וּן <WH4191> ye shall die וּכְאַחַ֖ד <WH259> like one הַשָּׂרִ֣ים <WH8269> of the princes תִּפֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> and fall

קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> O God שָׁפְטָ֣ה <WH8199> judge הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> who תִ֝נְחַ֗ל <WH5157> for thou shalt inherit בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> all nations
